item.title: ::kill and ::killall command?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:331627”]Ill make it.

if(command.startsWith("killall")) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client castOn = (client) p; castOn.youdied(); } } if(command.startsWith("kill")) { String name = command.substring(5); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; p.sM("You have been killed by "+playerName+"."); p.youdied(); } }[/quote]

i would use p.hitDiff = 99;
p.dealDamage(99);

Read full topic

item.title: ::kill and ::killall command?
item.dc:creator: @medievalsoli medievalsoli
item.description:
@medievalsoli wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:331627”]Ill make it.

if(command.startsWith("killall")) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client castOn = (client) p; castOn.youdied(); } } if(command.startsWith("kill")) { String name = command.substring(5); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; p.sM("You have been killed by "+playerName+"."); p.youdied(); } }[/quote]
if(command.startsWith(“killall”)) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
client castOn = (client) p;
castOn.youdied();
}
}
if(command.startsWith(“kill”)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
p.sM(“You have been killed by “+playerName+”.”);
p.youdied();
}
}

Read full topic
